beer.beer_description:
An award winning 5% pilsner style beer. Brewed in Estonia using pure spring water from one of the deepest wells in Europe and specially selected barley from across the Baltic region.

Traditional brewing techniques combine pale malts with gently toasted malts and the finest quality Saaz hops to create a beautifully balanced lager suitable for all occasions.

A light golden colour with fine carbonation produces a crisp white head. Grain and citrus on the nose with slight herbal notes. Clean, refreshing flavour with consistent malt and a hint of caramel. Fresh hops linger to provide a subtle elegance and a smooth finish.

Genuine premium lager for those who appreciate quality and purity.

Beautiful Beer.

items.badge_description: Light and crisp, a Pilsner is all you need to make your day great. Though, perhaps another one would make it even better. That’s 45 different Pilsners. Try 5 more for Level 10!

items.badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 200 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 41!

It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That's 265 check-ins with a photo.  Try 5 more for Level 54!
Light and crisp, a Pilsner is all you need to make your day great. Though, perhaps another one would make it even better. That’s 35 different Pilsners. Try 5 more for Level 8!

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!
Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 150 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 31!
Travel much? You must be a "brewsetter". That's at least a beer from 40 different countries. Try 5 more for Level 9!

items.badge_description: The power of pilsner! Part of our first round of “Super Style” badges in 2023, celebrate this crisp, clean lager, which ranked as the 10th most checked-in style of 2021 with over 1M check-ins. AVAILABLE ONLY TO UNTAPPD INSIDERS.

items.badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 5 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 2!

user.bio: No toast whores. Or guys with friend list's that look like buffalo bill's address book. And crash and burners

Burning up in flames,

Reduced to nothing but ash,

Drifting on the wind
I will try anything once but have a preference for Porters, Stouts and Milds, the darker the better!!
